 =

Summary

Implements a floating-point radix-2 SRT divider for HUB format

Parameters
M
parameter int

Width of the mantissa (23 by default).

E
parameter int

Width of the exponent (8 by default).

N
parameter int

Number of iterations (31 by default)

T
localparam int

Total length of the operands.

special_case
localparam int

Number of special case identifiers (e.g., 0 = none, 1 = +inf, etc.).

sign_mantissa_bit
localparam int

Width of the sign bit added to mantissa extension.

one_implicit_bit
localparam int

Implicit leading one in normalized mantissas.

ilsb_bit
localparam int

Extra bit for rounding support (Implicit Least Significant Bit).

extra_int_bit
localparam int

Extra bit for the integer part of the number.

extra_bit_x_gt_d
localparam int

Extra bit used when X's mantissa is greater than D's mantissa

extra_bits_mantissa
localparam int

Total number of extra bits added to the mantissa.

Ports
clk
input logic

System clock.

rst_l
input logic

reset signal (active low).

start
input logic

Initiates the operation.

x
input logic [T:0]

First operand in HUB floating-point format.

d
input logic [T:0]

Second operand in HUB floating-point format.

res
output logic [T:0]

Result of the floating-point division.

finish
output logic

Indicates the operation is complete.

computing
output logic

Indicates the operation is in progress.

special_case_detected
output logic

Flag indicating if a special case was detected.
